name: Fell Stinger
description: You lunge at a creature with a devastating sting attack. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing 1d8 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. If this attack causes the target to faint, double your ability modifier for attack rolls and damage on your next turn.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
